name: crux-news-ai-app
description: News AI App - MERN Stack with TypeScript

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: cd backend && npm run clean && cd ../frontend && rm -rf build
